## Bounty class

A representation of the bounty on a match participant.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare class Bounty 
```

## Constructors

|  Constructor | Modifiers | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [(constructor)(level)](./shieldbow.bounty._constructor_.md) |  | Constructs a new instance of the <code>Bounty</code> class |

## Properties

|  Property | Modifiers | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- | --- |
|  [announcement?](./shieldbow.bounty.announcement.md) |  | string | <i>(Optional)</i> The announcement that is made when the participant kills an enemy.<!-- -->This is only available for bounty levels &gt; 2. |
|  [assistBounty](./shieldbow.bounty.assistbounty.md) |  | number | The amount of gold assisting in killing the participant will earn. |
|  [consecutiveDeaths](./shieldbow.bounty.consecutivedeaths.md) |  | number | The number of consecutive deaths the participant has (to earn them this bounty). |
|  [consecutiveKills](./shieldbow.bounty.consecutivekills.md) |  | number | The number of consecutive kills the participant has (to earn them this bounty). |
|  [killBounty](./shieldbow.bounty.killbounty.md) |  | number | The amount of gold killing the participant will earn.<!-- -->The maximum amount that can be earned at once is 1000. The rest is carried over when the participant respawns. |
|  [level](./shieldbow.bounty.level.md) |  | number | The bounty level. |
